product_name: GNU Eco Genetics C2 BTX Snowboard - 2013/2014
long_description: Responsiveness, liveliness, and loads of pop are built into this board's DNA. The GNU Eco Genetics C2 BTX snowboard is an all-terrain freestyle and freeride masterpiece you'll want to ride everyday. C2 BTX technology features Banana Tech rocker between the feet and camber at the tip and tail, delivering amazing float whether you're riding regular or switch. Magne-Traction improves edge grip by adding seven contact points along the running length of the board, resulting in amazing control whether riding ice or pow. Directional Twin shape is ideal for conquering deep powder through the trees. AP2 wood core combines aspen and palonia wood with sintered sidewalls, offering incredible pop, strength and control. Liquid Crystal Polymer thermo-treated polyester fibers are built into the board, and offer incredible vibration absorption and 10 times the strength of titanium. Impact-resistant end-grain internal sidewalls; UHMW sidewalls stand up to wear and tear; steel edges; sintered base is fast and low maintenance. Eco Genetics C2 BTX artwork by Adam Haynes. .
short_description: Responsiveness, liveliness, and loads of pop are built into this board's DNA. The GNU Eco Genetics C2 BTX snowboard is an all-terrain freestyle and freeride masterpiece you'll want to ride everyday.
